author: dan131riley
body:
#### PR description:

There is at least one code path in Phase2TrackerMonitorDigi where an uninitialized pointer can be derefed, due to incomplete initialization of some MonitorElement pointers.  This PR initializes all MonitorElement pointers at construction, and removes some assignment statements that are made redundant.

Resolves #48752

#### PR validation:

Technical fix, should have no performance consequences.  Tested on WF 25234.0 step 3 with el8_amd64_gcc13 CMSSW_15_1_ASAN_X_2025-08-15-1100 and valgrind memcheck with CMSSW_15_1_X_2025-08-17-2300.
title: Phase2TrackerMonitorDigi: initialize MonitorElement pointers
